docs.message:
If you always put limits on everything you do, physical or anything else, It will spread into your work and into your life.

There are no limits. There are only plateaus, and you must not stay there, you must go beyond them.
docs.author: Bruce Lee

docs.message: You have to learn the rules of the game. And then you have to play better than anyone else.
docs.author: Albert Einstein

docs.message: Education is what remains after one has forgotten what one has learned in school.
docs.author: Albert Einstein

docs.message: A wise man can learn more from a foolish question than a fool can learn from a wise answer.
docs.author: Bruce Lee

docs.message: I fear not the man who has practiced 10,000 kicks once, but I fear the man who has practiced one kick 10,000 times.
docs.author: Bruce Lee

docs.message: We all have dreams. But in order to make dreams come into reality, it takes an awful lot of determination, dedication, self-discipline, and effort.
docs.author: Jesse Owens

docs.message: If you don’t have confidence, you’ll always find a way not to win.
docs.author: Carl Lewis

docs.message: Nothing can substitute for just plain hard work.
docs.author: Andre Agassi
